item.title: Uber beats fourth-quarter revenue expectations but offers soft guidance
item.description: Uber's mobility segment reported $6.91 billion in revenue, up 25% from a year earlier. StreetAccount analysts were expecting $6.77 billion.

item.title: Alphabet shares fall more than 8% on revenue miss, AI investment boost
item.description: Alphabet shares dropped after the search giant fell short of Wall Street's fourth-quarter revenue expectations and announced big spending plans

item.title: Disney tops quarterly profit estimates, but starts to lose Disney+ streaming subscribers
item.description: The company's streaming business reported another quarter of profitability despite a 1% decline in subscribers for Disney+.

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares rise on fourth-quarter profit beat, Wegovy sales jump
item.description: Danish pharmaceutical behemoth Novo Nordisk reported better-than-expected net profit in the fourth quarter, amid soaring demand for its Wegovy obesity...

item.title: Santander shares jump 7% after lender announces record quarterly profit, 10-billion-euro buyback
